Justification: To assess current blood pressure levels and monitor effectiveness of medication.
To rule out any underlying blood disorders that may be contributing to hypertension.
To assess heart rhythm and detect any abnormalities that may be related to hypertension.
To assess kidney function, as hypertension can damage the kidneys.
To assess cholesterol levels, as high cholesterol can increase the risk of heart disease.
To check for any signs of kidney damage or infection.
